metadata.title: CVE-2018-11775 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: TLS hostname verification when using the Apache ActiveMQ Client before 5.15.6 was missing which could make the client vulnerable to a MITM attack between a Java application using the ActiveMQ client and the ActiveMQ server. This is now enabled by default.

criterions.comment: activemq package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.8-2').
